overview: Critically renowned director and performer James Deen expands adult cinema with his ambitious "7 Sins" series. This installment follows the descent into depression of a young girl, played by Lia Lor. Deen and Lor, along with Amanda Tate and Jennifer Dark, inhabit a world of filth and depravity surrounded by beauty in a darkly arousing tale of SLOTH.
title: James Deen's 7 Sins: Sloth
